name: Remy Russell
Summary: Understand the users, buyers, and the problems worth solving to ensure success of the business
Inspire cross-functional collaboration to align on the most promising strategies
Drive the execution of the vision through rapid iteration of discovery and delivery

professionalExperience.position: Associate Product Manager, Platform and Integrations teams
professionalExperience.description: Product Lead for a Case Management platform used by social service providers (Homeless Management, Medically Tailored Meals, Behavioral Health, and more)
highlights: Elicited qualitative & quantitative insights to prioritize valuable initiatives, evolving the platform’s capabilities
Analyzed integration partner APIs and partnered with engineering to design the best solutions to extend user calabilities and enable growth
Managed stakeholder communication and owned relationships with external users and partners
Partnered with Sales, Client Success, and implementation teams to establish and maintain the roadmap, define KPIs, and establish mechanisms to measure & communicate them
achievements: Helped drive growth in ARR by over 50% by expanding platform capabilities, supporting/improving implementation processes, and increasing platform interoperability, ultimately leading to acquisition
Shipped a new RESTful API from 0 to 1 and onboarded over 10 customer organizations to start using it for their custom integration use cases
Helped establish a clear product catalog and a platform-based, microservice approach to enable growth/expansion across multiple customers on the platform

Led new growth initiatives and gained experience shipping and/or scrapping MVPs to integrate with third parties to extend user capabilities (e.g., Twilio for Email & SMS, Onfleet and WorkWave for last-mile delivery operations, Health Information Exchanges, Medicaid Payers, a Claims Processing System, a pharmacy benefit manager, external data warehouses, etc.)

highlights: Worked with project managers, implementation engineers, and customer contacts to implement over 10 new solutions, creating happy and sticky customers

Improved my SQL skills, my understanding of healthcare interoperability, and understanding of by necessity through designing complex d
achievements: Successfully implemented new solutions for two of Eccovia's top ten largest customers by ARR
Took ownership of all new integration use cases, and after finding patterns/similarities, advocated for and started designing agnostic services to support multiple customers and integration partners
Pushed the platform's interoperability capabilities to their limits and drove the platform's evolution to unlock the capabilities requested by our customers
